CreateDialog.title: Create spam keyword
CreateDialog.description: Enter a keyword to block in comments.
CreateDialog.error: Failed to create keyword. Please try again.

EditDialog.title: Edit spam keyword
EditDialog.description: Update the keyword used to block comments.
EditDialog.error: Failed to update keyword. Please try again.

DeleteDialog.title: Delete spam keyword
DeleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{keyword}"? This action cannot be undone.
DeleteDialog.fallbackDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this keyword? This action cannot be undone.
DeleteDialog.error: Failed to delete keyword. Please try again.

DeleteListDialog.title: Delete selected keywords
DeleteListDialog.description: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete this keyword? This action cannot be undone.} other {Are you sure you want to delete these {count} keywords? This action cannot be undone.}}
DeleteListDialog.success: {count, plural, one {Keyword deleted.} other {{count} keywords deleted.}}
DeleteListDialog.error: Failed to delete keywords. Please try again.
